node.title: Devops engineer
node.text:
#–≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è #vacancy #job #Belarus #Russsia #Ukraine #office #remote #fulltime #flexible #devops #aws #docker  #kubernetes #terraform
Position - DevOps Engineer
Company - Sphere Software
Location - Belarus, Russia, Ukraine
Work - Remote or Office, Full-time
Salary - 3700$ - 4800$ gross (3500$-4500$ nett)

Sphere Software is  partnered innovative trading platform with post-trade settlement and payments system and looking for DevOps engineer. 

Requirements:
üîπ 5+ years of experience as an SRE, DevOps engineer, operations engineer or similar
üîπ Expert at Linux system administration
üîπ Deep understanding of AWS technologies  
üîπ Experience using IaC tools such as Ansible or Terraform 
üîπ Hands-on experience using Docker, AWS ECS or other orchestration tools
üîπ Experience with bare metal infrastructures preferred
üîπ Proficient in Python or alternative scripting language 
üîπ Experience managing a metrics driven system infrastructure
üîπ Familiarity and hands on experience with common CI/CD pipeline tools (we use Jenkins) and container technologies
üîπ Experience using Hashicorp Vault and Consul (big plus)
üîπ Knowledge of cybersecurity mitigation and best practice (big plus)
üîπ Relevant experience from an exchange, proprietary trading firm or top tier bank (big plus) 
 
Responsibilities include but are not limited to:
üîπ Maintain and improve upon the uptime reliability of the overall platform 
üîπ Investigation and handling of issues in all public environments 
üîπ Designing automation tools and improving upon our deployment and release pipeline 
üîπ Build monitoring and alerting tools to keep internal teams and external stakeholders informed about system health and platform viability
üîπ Identify and advocate for changes vital to the stability and supportability of the system
üîπ Support the growth and scale of our infrastructure by suggesting and implementing new technology architecture
 
On-site benefits:
üîπ Competitive compensation and paid time off
üîπ Team of professionals providing you with the opportunity to grow
üîπ Sports compensation
üîπ Team building events.

Feel free to contact me for more info! üëã  @alex_ithr

‚Äî

–ì–æ—Ä–æ–¥ –∏ –∞–¥—Ä–µ—Å –æ—Ñ–∏—Å–∞: –≠–π–ª–∞—Ç, –ò–∑—Ä–∞–∏–ª—å

–ó–∞—Ä–ø–ª–∞—Ç–Ω–∞—è –≤–∏–ª–∫–∞: (–æ–±–∞ –∑–Ω–∞—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –æ–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã) –æ—Ç 2200$ –¥–æ 4500$ net
–û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏–∏:

https://trucknet.io/en/open-positions/middle-senior-backend-typescript-developer/

Who are we looking for
We are looking for a Backend Developer to join our R&D department in Eilat, Israel. Have you ever dreamed of working with a small and capable team in a coastal town on the southern edge of the Negev Desert? Are you interested in creating an eco-friendly product in a domain of logistics and transportation, solving mysteries problems and facing new challenges? If so, the Trucknet team is just the place for you!
Responsibilities
 ‚Ä¢ Implementing new features and providing support for various microservices.
 ‚Ä¢ Proposing, brainstorming and carrying out refactoring to improve the internal structure of our software.
 ‚Ä¢ Improving the developer experience by constantly bettering our toolbox.
 ‚Ä¢ Advancing deployment/integration infrastructure.
Requirements
 ‚Ä¢ 3+ years of professional experience with backend development.
 ‚Ä¢ Acquaintance with Typescript, OOP Javascript, NodeJS.
 ‚Ä¢ Acquaintance with MongoDB and experience with databases in general.
 ‚Ä¢ Practical skills in software architecture and software design.
Advantages
 ‚Ä¢ Knowledge of Docker and Kubernetes.
 ‚Ä¢ Understanding the concept of horizontal scaling and what limitations it does impose on the application.
 ‚Ä¢ Strong knowledge of MongoDB, PostgreSQL.
 ‚Ä¢ Experience with CI/CD (we use GitLab CI).
 ‚Ä¢ Experience with test-driven development.
 ‚Ä¢ Experience with AWS.


–ù–∞–∑–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏: Trucknet (https://trucknet.io/)

Requirements:

You must be:

- A mature and responsible individual driven by results and not activities.
- An individual with genuine interest in technology.
- Willing to learn, grow, and admit mistakes.
- Able to communicate with other people on the project's team effectively.
 
Skills/Experience:

- Node.js, React, SQL and NoSQL databases.
- APIs.
- Effective Written and Verbal English.
- Basic Understanding of DevOps and SDLC.
 
The following will be a good plus:

- Experience with Amazon AWS, serverless technologies, and microservices on its platform.
- Experience with CRM and ERP systems such as Zoho and others.
